sentences.sContent: The famous athlete had no vantage to win the game.
sentences.sContent_eng: The famous athlete had no vantage to win the game.
sentences.sCn: 那个有名的运动员已经没有优势赢得那场比赛了。

sentences.sContent: Since you have no vantage, you have to make great effort.
sentences.sContent_eng: Since you have no vantage, you have to make great effort.
sentences.sCn: （既然）你没有优势，你（就）必须努力。

trans.tranOther: a state, position, or opportunity affording superiority or advantage
